mapper.select:
select
from t_personal_ewallet a where a.t_personalewallet_ApplierPID = #{t_personalewallet_ApplierPID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_personal_ewallet a where 1=1
and a.t_personalewallet_ApplierName like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_ApplierName},'%')
and a.t_personalewallet_ApplierPID like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_ApplierPID},'%')
and a.t_personalewallet_ClearNum like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_ClearNum},'%')
and a.t_personalewallet_PayRules like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_PayRules},'%')
and a.t_personalewallet_PayCat like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_PayCat},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')

from t_personal_ewallet a
where a.t_P_Company = #{t_P_Company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
